report.title: SITAM College Student Branch Inaugural - IEEE Vizag Bay Sub Section

description.text: <p>SITAM Student Branch is inaugurated by Mr. K.V. Sriram, IEEE Vizag Bay Sub Section. followed by IEEE Benefits talk by Mr. Md.K.M.Chisti, Secretary, IEEE Vizag bay sub section. About 100 Non-IEEE, 10 Faculty and 10 IEEE Members have actively participated in the Event. Mr Sriram in his speech suggested students do what they like to do and do it with love and interest in whatever you do. His speech motivated many students there.&nbsp;</p>

report.keywords: IEEE Vizag BAy Sub Section

report.title: Signal Processing Methods for Wireless Channel modelling of Drone-Ground Communication Links-IEEE Vizag Bay Sub Section-Pragati Engineering College

description.text: <p>In this talk, we will first consider the challenges of developing a communication system for drone-to-ground links. As a first step, experiments to model the wireless channels for such links are being carried out in IISc. The channel measurement system design and data collection methodology will be presented. Based on the data collection, preliminary channel models based on these measurements will be presented in the talk using signal processing concepts like convolution, correlation.</p>

report.keywords: Vizag Bay Sub Section

speaker.organization: Professor,Department of ECE, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore

topic.title: Signal Processing Methods for Wireless Channel modelling of Drone-Ground Communication Links

report.title: TISP event in Vizag Bay area, Govt High School at Payakarao Peta, Near Tuni-IEEE Vizag Bay Sub Section

description.text: <p>Teacher In-Service Programme was organized by IEEE Vizag Bay Sub-Section on 30<sup>th</sup> November 2019 at Government High School, Payakaraopeta, Near Tuni, Andhra Pradesh. <strong>39</strong> Science teaching teachers from <strong>19</strong> different Government High Schools of Visakhapatnam District participated this event. <strong>Sri M.G.P.L. Narayana</strong> Past Chair IEEE Hyderabad was the Chief Guest and mentioned the need of science education from early stage of career. He gave few examples of great scientists and their observations on science education. He also emphasized the need of inventions, science education in engineering stream of education.&nbsp; Sri <strong>K. V. Sriram</strong>, Chair IEEE Vizag Bay Sub-Section mentioned that the teachers need to develop the curiosity in learning Science in Children.&nbsp; Dr <strong>Abraham</strong> spoke on the recent scientific developments. Dr. <strong>Lakshminarayana Sadasivuni</strong> mentioned the &ldquo;Research in Social Networks and how traditional science helped the modern age&rdquo;. Smt. <strong>Ili Abraham</strong>, the resource person of this event spoke on &ldquo;Teaching Science in Modern age&rdquo;. Teaching Methodology kits, Exhibits of Science Learning &amp; Teaching and Concepts of Science Curriculum Posters were presented to the teachers by Sri M.G.P.L. Narayana. Feedback received from the participants is in the level of <strong>91%</strong> in the areas of Rating of the Speaker and Speaker Content. Sri Naresh Headmaster proposed vote of thanks.</p>

report.keywords: TISP event in Vizag Bay area, Govt High School at Payakarao Peta, Near Tuni-IEEE Vizag Bay Sub Section

topic.title: Teaching Science in Modern age
Science Education and Inspiring Teaching Science
